content.prompt:
Used by permission

In this Kuba sculpture of a king, the proportion of the head is exaggerated to show

choices.label: a royal relationship with infants and rebirth
the pride of royalty in their elite status
the value place on intelligence in leaders
the personal style of the artist

skill.text: Skill 5.B: In analyzing a work of art beyond the image set, explain how artistic decisions about form, style, materials, technique, and/or content shape a work of art (or group of related works of art).
